trans-unit.source: Represents a shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: 代表捷徑功能表。

trans-unit.source: ContextMenuStrip replaces <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: ContextMenuStrip 取代<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: You can associate a ContextMenuStrip with any control, and a right mouse click automatically displays the shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將 ContextMenuStrip 與任何控制項，並以滑鼠右鍵按一下自動顯示的捷徑功能表。

trans-unit.source: You can show a ContextMenuStrip programmatically by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Show%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用，以程式設計方式顯示 ContextMenuStrip<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Show%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Show%2A>

trans-unit.source: ContextMenuStrip supports cancelable <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Opening> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing> events to handle dynamic population and multiple-click scenarios.
trans-unit.target: ContextMenuStrip 支援可取消<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Opening>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing>事件來處理動態擴展和多個按一下案例。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Opening>

trans-unit.source: ContextMenuStrip supports images, menu-item check state, text, access keys, shortcuts, and cascading menus.
trans-unit.target: ContextMenuStrip 支援映像、 功能表項目檢查狀態、 文字、 存取金鑰、 捷徑和串聯功能表。

trans-unit.source: The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> in all orientations.
trans-unit.target: 下列項目專為緊密地與這兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>中所有方向。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>

trans-unit.source: They are available by default at design time for the ContextMenuStrip control: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> Shortcut menus are typically used to combine different menu items from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> of a form that are useful for the user given the context of the application.
trans-unit.target: 它們可在設計階段 ContextMenuStrip 控制項預設可以:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>快顯功能表通常用來從不同的功能表項目結合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>提供內容給此應用程式的使用者很有用的格式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use a shortcut menu assigned to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control to provide menu items for changing the font of the text, finding text within the control, or Clipboard features for copying and pasting text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用捷徑功能表，指派給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項功能表項目提供變更的文字，尋找控制項或剪貼簿複製並貼上文字的功能內文字的字型。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: You can also expose new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> objects in a shortcut menu that are not located within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> to provide situation-specific commands that are inappropriate for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> to display.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以新增公開<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>快顯功能表中的物件不位於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>提供不適合的特定情況下的命令<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a shortcut menu is displayed when a user clicks the right mouse button over a control or the form itself.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，當使用者在控制項或表單本身上方按一下滑鼠右鍵時，會顯示快顯功能表。

trans-unit.source: Many visible controls, as well as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> itself, have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property that binds the ContextMenuStrip class to the control that displays the shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: 許多可見的控制項，並將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>本身，有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>將 ContextMenuStrip 類別繫結至控制項顯示的捷徑功能表的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: More than one control can use a ContextMenuStrip.
trans-unit.target: 多個控制項都可以使用 ContextMenuStrip。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowCheckMargin%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true` to add space to the left of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> for a check mark that shows that the menu item is enabled or selected.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowCheckMargin%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性`true`左邊加入空格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>核取記號，顯示的功能表項目已啟用，或選取。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowCheckMargin%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowImageMargin%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `true` by default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowImageMargin%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性設定為`true`預設。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowImageMargin%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use this space to the left of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> to display an image for that menu item.
trans-unit.target: 使用此空間的左邊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>顯示該功能表項目的影像。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: Although ContextMenuStrip replaces and adds functionality to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> control of previous versions, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if so desired.
trans-unit.target: 雖然 ContextMenuStrip 取代，並將功能加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>的較舊的版本控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>如果您想要保留以提供回溯相容性及未來使用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> class and associates it with the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref>類別，並將它與指定的容器關聯。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to ensure that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> is disposed of properly, since it is not a child of the form.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式，以確保<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>處置的正常運作，因為它不是表單的子系。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: A component that implements <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> that is the container of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 實作的元件<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref>也就是容器的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref>並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>參考。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用`Dispose`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Sets the control to the specified visible state.
trans-unit.target: 將控制項設定為指定的可見狀態。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to make the control visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>將控制項設為可見的。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the last control that caused this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得導致此最後一個控制項<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref>顯示。

trans-unit.source: Common uses of the SourceControl property include the following: - Adding, removing, enabling, or disabling a menu item during the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Opening> event.
trans-unit.target: SourceControl 屬性的一般用途包括下列:-加入、 移除、 啟用，或停用功能表項目期間<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Opening>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Opening>

trans-unit.source: - Deciding on modifications of a chosen command based on the control that last displayed the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.
trans-unit.target: -決定選擇命令，最後顯示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>控制項為基礎的修改

trans-unit.source: The control that caused this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 導致此控制項<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref>顯示。
